card.description: This dataset contains measurement data about popular brands of jeans.

context.potentialUses: Predict the price of a pair of jeans based on who they're for, the size of the pockets, etc.

Style.description: The fit or style of jeans, e.g. skinny or boot cut.

Mens or womens.description: Whether the jeans were sold to target men or women.

Cotton contents.description: Amount of cotton in the fabric, where 0 means no cotton at all, and 1 means 100% cotton.

Price in dollars.description: The price of the jeans in US dollars.

Max height of front pocket.description: The height of the front pocket from its deepest part.

Min height of front pocket.description: The height of the front pocket from its most shallow part.

Front rivet height.description: Front pocket openings curve down towards the side of the leg, ending in a rivet. This number measures the distance from the top of the pocket to that rivet.

Max width of front pocket.description: The width of the front pocket from its widest part.

Min width of front pocket.description: The width of the front pocket from its narrowest part.

Max width of back pocket.description: The width of the back pocket from its widest part.

Min width of back pocket.description: The width of the back pocket from its narrowest part.

Max height of back pocket.description: The height of the back pocket from its deepest part.

Min height of back pocket.description: The height of the back pocket from its shallowest part.
